property.name: title
property.value: Canadian Patient Experiences Survey — Inpatient Care — Version 3

property.name: text
property.value:
You should fill out this questionnaire only if you were the patient named on the envelope. You may need to get help from a family member or friend to answer the questions. That’s okay.
Answer all the questions by selecting the circle to the left of your answer.
Your response to this survey is voluntary but will provide us with important information.

property.name: text
property.value: Please answer the questions about your recent stay at the hospital named on the cover letter. Do not include any other hospital stays in your answers.

property.name: text
property.value: How often did nurses treat you with courtesy and respect?

property.name: text
property.value: How often did nurses listen carefully to you?

property.name: text
property.value: How often did nurses explain things in a way you could understand?

property.name: text
property.value: After you pressed the call button, how often did you get help as soon as you wanted it?

property.name: label
property.value: I never pressed the call button

property.name: value
property.value: I never pressed the call button

property.name: text
property.value: How often did doctors treat you with courtesy and respect?

property.name: text
property.value: How often did doctors listen carefully to you?

property.name: text
property.value: How often did doctors explain things in a way you could understand?

property.name: text
property.value: How often were your room and bathroom kept clean?

property.name: text
property.value: How often was the area around your room quiet at night?

property.name: text
property.value: Did you need help from nurses or other hospital staff in getting to the bathroom or in using a bedpan?

property.name: text
property.value: How often did you get help in getting to the bathroom or in using a bedpan as soon as you wanted?

property.name: text
property.value: Did you need medicine for pain?

property.name: text
property.value: How often was your pain well controlled?

property.name: text
property.value: How often did the hospital staff do everything they could to help you with your pain?

property.name: text
property.value: Were you given any medicine that you had not taken before?

property.name: text
property.value: Before giving you any new medicine, how often did hospital staff tell you what the medicine was for?

property.name: text
property.value: Before giving you any new medicine, how often did hospital staff describe possible side effects in a way you could understand?

property.name: text
property.value: After you left the hospital, did you go directly to your own home, to someone else’s home or to another health facility?

property.name: text
property.value: During this hospital stay, did doctors, nurses or other hospital staff talk with you about whether you would have the help you needed when you left the hospital?

property.name: text
property.value: During this hospital stay, did you get information in writing about what symptoms or health problems to look out for after you left the hospital?

property.name: text
property.value: Please answer the following questions about your stay at the hospital named on the cover letter. Do not include any other hospital stays in your answers.

property.name: text
property.value: How would you rate this hospital during your stay?

property.name: description
property.value: Using any number from 0 to 10, where 0 is the worst hospital possible and 10 is the best hospital possible.

property.name: text
property.value: Would you recommend this hospital to your friends and family?

property.name: text
property.value: In this next section, we ask several more questions about your stay at the hospital.

property.name: text
property.value: When you arrived at the hospital, did you go to the emergency department?

property.name: text
property.value: Before coming to the hospital, did you have enough information about what was going to happen during the admission process?

property.name: text
property.value: Was your admission into the hospital organized?

property.name: text
property.value: When you were in the emergency department, did you get enough information about your condition and treatment?

property.name: text
property.value: Were you given enough information about what was going to happen during your admission to the hospital?

property.name: text
property.value: Was your transfer from the emergency department into a hospital bed organized?

property.name: text
property.value: After you knew that you needed to be admitted to a hospital bed, did you have to wait too long before getting there?

property.name: text
property.value: Do you feel that there was good communication about your care between doctors, nurses and other hospital staff?

property.name: text
property.value: How often did doctors, nurses and other hospital staff seem informed and up-to-date about your hospital care?

property.name: text
property.value: How often were tests and procedures done when you were told they would be done?

property.name: label
property.value: I did not have any tests or procedures

property.name: value
property.value: I did not have any tests or procedures

property.name: text
property.value: During this hospital stay, did you get all the information you needed about your condition and treatment?

property.name: text
property.value: Did you get the support you needed to help you with any anxieties, fears or worries you had during this hospital stay?

property.name: text
property.value: Were you involved as much as you wanted to be in decisions about your care and treatment?

property.name: text
property.value: Were your family or friends involved as much as you wanted in decisions about your care and treatment?

property.name: label
property.value: I did not want them to be involved

property.name: value
property.value: I did not want them to be involved

property.name: label
property.value: I did not have family or friends to be involved

property.name: value
property.value: I did not have family or friends to be involved

property.name: text
property.value: Before you left the hospital, did you have a clear understanding about all of your prescribed medications, including those you were taking before your hospital stay?

property.name: text
property.value: Did you receive enough information from hospital staff about what to do if you were worried about your condition or treatment after you left the hospital?

property.name: text
property.value: When you left the hospital, did you have a better understanding of your condition than when you entered?

property.name: text
property.value: Overall, do you feel you were helped by your hospital stay?

property.name: description
property.value: Please answer on a scale where 0 is “not helped at all” and 10 is “helped completely.”

property.name: text
property.value: Overall, did you have a good experince during your hospital stay?

property.name: description
property.value: Please answer on a scale where 0 is “I had a very poor experience” and 10 is “I had a very good experience.”

property.name: label
property.value: I had a very poor experience

property.name: label
property.value: I had a very good experience

property.name: text
property.value: In general, how would you rate your overall physical health?

property.name: text
property.value: In general, how would you rate your overall mental or emotional health?

property.name: text
property.value: What is the highest grade or level of school that you have completed?

property.name: label
property.value: Some high school, but did not graduate

property.name: value
property.value: Some high school, but did not graduate

property.name: label
property.value: High school or high school equivalency certificate

property.name: value
property.value: High school or high school equivalency certificate

property.name: label
property.value: College, CEGEP or other non-university certificate or diploma

property.name: value
property.value: College, CEGEP or other non-university certificate or diploma

property.name: text
property.value: What is your year of birth?

property.name: text
property.value: Was your most recent stay at this hospital for a childbirth experience?

property.name: text
property.value: People living in Canada come from many different cultural and racial backgrounds. The following question will help us to better understand the experiences of the communities that we serve. Do you consider yourself to be . . .

property.name: label
property.value: South Asian (East Indian, Pakistani, Sri Lankan, etc.)

property.name: value
property.value: South Asian (East Indian, Pakistani, Sri Lankan, etc.)

property.name: label
property.value: Southeast Asian (Vietnamese, Cambodian, Malaysian, Laotian, etc.)

property.name: value
property.value: Southeast Asian (Vietnamese, Cambodian, Malaysian, Laotian, etc.)

property.name: text
property.value: Is there anything else you would like to share about your hospital stay?
